author: Candice Roggenkamp
comment: This app does its job. But I have the lg urban and it separates out going and incoming messages. Incoming messages are under just the phone number while the outbound messages are under the contact's name. If this gets fixed it would be 5 stars.
title: Efficiency

author: Pauline Mulpeter
comment: Want a refund on both of these apps I bought don't do a thing for my samsung s2 gear when I press on app just brings me back to playstore nothing I'm not getting notifications.

comment: Did not work. Asked me to get phone app for $

reply.content: What kind of watches do you have? You can help us fix the problem in next update. Contact us at letepccultech@gmail.com
